body.name: 2 Pieces Fix Sinking Office Chair, 304 Stainless Steel Office Chair Saver for Stop Sinking, Sinking Office Chair Repair Kit with Allen Wrench, Adjustable Chair Height Without Cylinder Replacement

features: [WHAT YOU GET] - You will get 2 pieces of 304 stainless steel fix office chair sinking clamp and 2 pieces of hexagon wrench to tighten the screws, convenient and quick installation. The office chair gas lift cylinder brackets which are equipped with silicone gasket can effectively prevent the chair from sinking.

[GREAT OFFICE CHAIR SAVER] – The upgraded office chair saver can control the height of the office chair, can prevent chair sinking anymore. The universal size office chair sinking clamps can fit most office chairs for the lifting cylinder with outer diameter of 25-28mm (0.98-1.1 inches). After fixing, the office chair can rotate smoothly as before and prolong the service life of the chair.
[WIDE APPLICATION] – This chair sinking fixing tool can be used in various scenarios. You can use it to fix sinking office chairs in the office, or other similar place which need to be fixed.

[EASY TO INSTALL] – No need to disassemble the chair or cylinder. Just few minutes to install office chair sinking stop, prevent chair from sinking and bring comfortable seating experience for you. Firstly, adjust the chair to the ideal height you want and mark it. Install the metal plate and rubber gasket, then clamp them to the position and fix it with screws. Firmly Screw on the two bolts on the clamps by hexagonal wrench. Then your chair will no longer drop down.
[HIGH QUALITY] - The office chair saver tools are made of 304 stainless steels, sturdy and reliable. Compared with plastic saver, our chair saver can offer you with a very long-term use.
body.description: The office chair sinking fix tool can control the height of the seat, stop chair sinking anymore after improvement. After fixing, the office chair can rotate smoothly as before and prolong the service life of the chair. The universal size office chair sinking clamps can fit most office chairs for the lifting cylinder with outer diameter of 25-28mm (0.98-1.1 inches). Specifications: Item: Office chair savers with Wrench Material: 304 Stainless steels Size: 25-28 mm / 0.98-1.1 Inches in diameter Package includes: 2Pcs x Office chair savers 2Pcs x Allen Wrench

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Very good price, fixed problem of leaking ram on chair !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Appears to work WELL! These DO fit larger chair tubes.
reviews.reviewText: I am particularly glad that I bought the TWO Pack, just in case they do slip! As in the photo, I mounted them atop each other with about an inch above them, so even if that inch disappears, I still have a much better situation than without!I installed these four days ago and SO FAR, GREAT! I am NOT a light person (around 205 pounds) and these appear to be holding. I LIKE that they: 1) fit my 1+ inch chair tube as the ad says 2) come with some sort of plastic liner that is non-slip 3) have sturdy screws for severe tightening.I only gave them 4 stars for ease of assembly because I think they would be MURDER to install using the included 6mm hand held hex wrenches. Fortunately, I have metric wrenches for a socket driver. It takes TORQUE to fully tighten these that I doubt can be achieved with your fingers holding the wrenches, but they DO tighten with a good ratchet socket wrench!UPDATED February 4, 2024 - STILL HOLDING and I am NOT LIGHT! AWESOME! To those who still have slippage, MAYBE you need more torque when tightening. I used a high quality socket wrench!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had an old chair that I didn't have the money or time to replace and this took care of the minor inconvenience of it not going up all the way. This was pretty simple to attach and much cheaper than getting a whole new canister of air replaced. Obviously there are some downsides, such as not being able to lower your chair once it's attached but you get what you pay for. So far it has been sturdy and hasn't slipped at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My seat no longer sinks down!
reviews.reviewText: It fixed what I needed it to. My desk chair is not that old, bought it 2nd hand new in box but within a couple of months it started slowly sinking until it bottomed out. I eventually got tired and sought a solution. This did the trick, was fairly easy to do, and now my seat stays where I need it to. Only downside would be if I needed to adjust the seat, it is set at one spot. - Good thing I don't need to adjust it. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really does work!!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical when I bought it. I was annoyed because my work chair would go down no matter what. I was like this over a year. It was either buy another chair or try this gadget which a very inexpensive fix. It worked, I'm a very happy camper thanks to this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work well to shore up sinking chair.
reviews.reviewText: These work well to shore up sinking chair. These solve a problem with broken pneumatic cylinders in office chairs. Inexpensive, sturdy, and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Procuct Fine. AMAZON SUCKS SO BADLY IN "FREE DELIVERIES" IT HURTS.
reviews.reviewText: The clamps do what they are supposed to do. I chose "Free Delivery". They _LOST_ it 60 miles away and that was that. "TRACK PACKAGE" SHOWED IT SITTING IN THE DEPOT FOR DAYS!!! _I_ had to SEARCH to find a contact us Chat. _I_ had to tell them it was LOST. So they sent another at FREE speed. I was told if I re-search for that chat I can use the tracking number to get 50% back. FIVE dollars of AMAZON CREDIT. MEH!
Once attached keeps chair at height always - works as described

I am still very amazed on how this item has solved my Sinking chair problem that I have had for more than 9 months. I tried so many other remedies and none work. I was also skeptical of this one at first. One thing missing that could help is documentation of how to put it on the chair for it to be effective. I had to look closely at the pictures on the Amazon website to realize that the bracket is placed at the bottom of the cylinder for it to be most effective. Overall, I am thrilled with my purchase.

I have two desk chairs that would sink right down within minutes of sitting on them. I put one of these on each chair. They have stayed put for 3 weeks now and I use one of the chairs for many hours a day.
Didn’t work at all. Don’t waste your money. Spend the extra and get a new cylinder for the chair.
